title: How much free time do you have per day, a lot or very little? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5 days in a week my schedule is : 7.00–7.15 I wake up7.30–7.45 ready for gym8.00–8.45 work out9.00–9.30 Cooking10.00–10.20- ready for office and go temple11.00–11.15 till 8 PM- I work in office.These are the must do things which I can not skip. Once I back from the office till 8.15–8.30 I cook and have dinner till 9 max, after that sometime I watch web series or any thing , sometime I do laundry during the weekdays in the night to save my time for weekends. I love sleeping so some times I sleep at 10–10.30 also but usually I sleep at 11.00 Max. So I do not think so during the week days I have much free time, however in the weekends I am able to manage more free time ,which I spend with my family, clean the house, manage cupboards and other household things. I also want to contribute some times in social activities hence I attend programs in Jain temple. when I am at home I love to cook something special, when I am not doing anything I love to create my own crafts. I am sure, people wonder how would I get time to write and read on Quora :-D, so I write and read when I get any free time in office, I am less active on Quora during weekends. Also, I am not active on FB, Insta and any other social networking sites. Thanks for reading.
